tool_description: API for access to Tranquil City's expert-created environmental datasets
title: TranquilCityData

api_list.name: bristol-grid-tranquil-route
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tranquilcitydata.p.rapidapi.com/v1/bristol/grid/tranquil/route/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tranquilcitydata.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
